thread.section_title: Merchant One Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Merchant One | merchantone.com
thread.title: Dawn Mallory
thread.title_full: Merchant One reviewed by Dawn Mallory

author: Dawn Mallory
title: Dawn Mallory
text: This is our first experience in owning a business that does debit/credit sales. We were both very fearful of how it would work and what kind of delay we would have on getting our funds deposited. Our sales rep did a great job to explain and when we had questions a couple months in I called him and he was kind, polite and gave me a person to help explain the process. Also appreciated having options of how often we would pay our charge. Thank you, your people are easy to understand and are very helpful.
